name: fever
description: Elevated body temperature above 98.6°F (37°C)

name: cough
description: Sudden expulsion of air from the lungs to clear airways

name: fatigue
description: Persistent tiredness and lack of energy

name: headache
description: Pain in any region of the head

name: chest_pain
description: Discomfort or pain in the chest area

name: shortness_of_breath
description: Difficulty breathing or feeling breathless

name: nausea
description: Sensation of unease in the stomach with urge to vomit

name: dizziness
description: Feeling of lightheadedness or unsteadiness

name: joint_pain
description: Pain or discomfort in one or more joints

name: skin_rash
description: Change in skin appearance with redness or bumps

name: weight_loss
description: Unintentional decrease in body weight

name: excessive_thirst
description: Abnormally strong desire to drink fluids

name: frequent_urination
description: Need to urinate more often than usual

name: blurred_vision
description: Lack of sharpness in vision

name: numbness
description: Loss of sensation in a body part

name: muscle_weakness
description: Reduced strength in one or more muscles

name: abdominal_pain
description: Pain or discomfort in the belly area

name: back_pain
description: Pain in the upper or lower back

name: sore_throat
description: Pain or irritation in the throat

name: runny_nose
description: Excess nasal drainage

name: sneezing
description: Sudden involuntary expulsion of air through nose

name: sweating
description: Abnormal amount of perspiration

name: chills
description: Feeling of coldness with shivering

name: loss_of_appetite
description: Reduced desire to eat

name: insomnia
description: Difficulty falling or staying asleep

name: anxiety
description: Feeling of worry nervousness or unease

name: depression
description: Persistent feelings of sadness and hopelessness

name: swelling
description: Enlargement of body parts due to fluid accumulation

name: constipation
description: Infrequent or difficult bowel movements

name: diarrhea
description: Loose watery stools occurring frequently
